remarks: Define the ` Line ` function.  This function generates the line passing through the distinct points ` a ` and ` b ` .  Adapted from definition 6.14 of [Schwabhauser] p. 45.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 25-Oct-2013.)
statement:
df-line2 $p |- Line = { <. <. a , b >. , l >. | E. n e. NN ( ( a e. ( EE ` n ) /\ b e. ( EE ` n ) /\ a =/= b ) /\ l = [ <. a , b >. ] `' Colinear ) } $.
$d a b l n $.
